001package edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.viewmodel;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.util.Log;
005import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
006import androidx.lifecycle.DefaultLifecycleObserver;
007import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
008import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
009import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
010import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
011import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
012import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.model.Passphrase;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.service.PassphraseRepository;
015import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
016import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
017import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
018import io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Action;
019import io.reactivex.rxjava3.functions.Consumer;
020import java.util.List;
021import javax.inject.Inject;
022
023@HiltViewModel
024public class PassphraseViewModel extends ViewModel implements DefaultLifecycleObserver {
025
026  private final PassphraseRepository repository;
027  private final MutableLiveData<Passphrase> passphrase;
028  private final MutableLiveData<List<Passphrase>> passphrases;
029  private final MutableLiveData<List<String>> generated;
030  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
031  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
032
033  @Inject
034   PassphraseViewModel(@ApplicationContext Context context, PassphraseRepository repository) {
035    this.repository = repository;
036    passphrase = new MutableLiveData<>();
037    passphrases = new MutableLiveData<>();
038    generated = new MutableLiveData<>();
039    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
040    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
041    fetch();
042  }
043
044  public LiveData<Passphrase> getPassphrase() {
045    return passphrase;
046  }
047
048  public LiveData<List<Passphrase>> getPassphrases() {
049    return passphrases;
050  }
051
052  public LiveData<List<String>> getGenerated() {
053    return generated;
054  }
055
056  public LiveData<Throwable> getThrowable() {
057    return throwable;
058  }
059
060  public void fetch(String key) {
061    execute(repository.get(key), passphrase::postValue);
062  }
063
064  public void fetch() {
065    execute(repository.get(), passphrases::postValue);
066  }
067
068  public void search(String fragment) {
069    execute(repository.search(fragment), passphrases::postValue);
070  }
071
072  public void save(Passphrase passphrase) {
073    execute(repository.save(passphrase), this.passphrase::postValue);
074  }
075
076  public void delete(String key) {
077    repository
078        .delete(key)
079        .subscribe(() -> {}, this::postThrowable, pending); // TODO: 11/2/23 Refresh displayed list.
080  }
081
082  public void generate(int length) {
083    execute(repository.generate(length), generated::postValue);
084  }
085
086  public void clearGenerated() {
087    generated.postValue(null);
088  }
089
090  public void clearPassphrase() {
091    passphrase.postValue(null);
092  }
093
094  @Override
095  public void onStop(@NonNull LifecycleOwner owner) {
096    DefaultLifecycleObserver.super.onStop(owner);
097    pending.clear();
098  }
099
100  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
101    Log.e(getClass().getSimpleName(), throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
102    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
103  }
104
105  private <T> void execute(Single<T> stream, Consumer<? super T> consumer, MutableLiveData<?>... clearList) {
106    clearLiveData(clearList);
107    stream.subscribe(consumer, this::postThrowable, pending);
108  }
109
110  private void execute(Completable stream, Action action,  MutableLiveData<?>... clearList) {
111    clearLiveData(clearList);
112    stream.subscribe(action, this::postThrowable, pending);
113  }
114
115  private void clearLiveData(MutableLiveData<?>[] clearList) {
116    throwable.postValue(null);
117    for (MutableLiveData<?> ld : clearList) {
118      ld.postValue(null);
119    }
120  }
121
122}
